channel.title: Protein Localization on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Protein Localization on RD's Blog

item.title: Protein Isoelectric Point (pI) and Intracellular Localization: Relationships and Functional Insights
item.description: Notes on a 2021 Frontiers review discussing how proteome-wide protein pI distributions are linked to subcellular localization. The paper highlights how environmental conditions and compartment-specific features shape protein pI profiles, offering insights into protein solubility, function, and adaptation.
